title: The Jurassic Park franchise : domestic and global box office revenue 2018
summary: The statistic presents the global box office of the Jurassic_World of the Jurassic Park Movie series in North America and Worldwide .

As of , `` Jurassic_World of the Jurassic Park : On Jurassic_Park_III '' , the fourth installment in the series , reached a gross of 181.17 million U.S. dollars in 4,164 cinemas across North America .
Johnny Depp , the actor who plays Captain Jack Sparrow , ranked fifth on the list of the best-paid actors Worldwide in 2016 , with an annual income of 48 million U.S. dollars .
gold: The statistic presents the box office revenue of the Jurassic Park movie series in North America and worldwide.
As of October 2018 , `` Jurassic World '' , the fourth installment in the series released in 2015 , reached a gross of 652.27 million U.S. dollars in 4,291 cinemas across North America.
It is currently the fifth most successful movie of all time based on global box office revenue .
